name: Raise Me Up - A Pacific Rim Fanfiction
name_original: Raise Me Up - A Pacific Rim Fanfiction
description:
A quiet night in at the lab could mean flirting, fears and feelings for Newt and Hermann...

I made this in/around June/July, it was my first Twine game ever (so it's not that complicated)

cover image by the fantastico ivatimsee

There are 2 endings (both happy) I DONT OWN PACIFIC RIM

Thanks to the many, many beta testers I had, I can't remember who all of you were, but I'm p sure that Hermie, Ivelina, Harriet and Polly were among them so thank you guys
